This game will replace your childhood. If you are bored and ready to learn some Russian swear words, this is a go-to place for that. CS:GO has been my best friend since the age of 10, when I was playing 1.6 version 24/7 and would step away from my computer only to eat and use a bathroom. It brings you the feeling that you can dominate on every single player if you are good enough. That feeling can't be replaced by anything else. It's the best 1st person view game out there, and it will never die. CS will be alive forever!
Great when you dont have hackers, but the Trust factor and being able to purchase prime doesnt help much, or at all.

I think that counter strike is a very good, welcoming game whether you are new to PC shooters or not. It has a very interesting community of mostly medium skill players that makes the game very easy to get used to and actually enjoy.
